channel.title: Code Coverage on Blanket
channel.description: Recent content in Code Coverage on Blanket

item.title: Coverage Is Not Strongly Correlated With Test Suite Effectiveness (2014)
item.description:
There is doubt that code coverage can measure efficiency of a test suites. For instance, Winters et al. claimed that an objective code coverage cannnot lead developers to write tests to meet the threashold in a note on code coverage, secition 11.2.4 in Software Engineering at Google. Additionally, they also claimed code coverage of a test suite cannot ensure the ability of the test suits to detect faults under the tested code.

The above statements are
